Package index

Main operation

create_gldp()
Create a GeoLocator Data Package
add_gldp_resource()
Add a Geolocator Data Resource
read_gldp()
Read a GeoLocator Data Package
merge_gldp()
Merge Two GeoLocator Data Packages
update_gldp() update_gldp_temporal() update_gldp_spatial() update_gldp_taxonomic() update_gldp_number_tags() update_gldp_bibliographic_citation() update_gldp_reference_location() update_gldp_metadata()
Update computed metadata of a GeoLocator Data Package

Accessor (and assignment) functions

tags() `tags<-`()
Get or set tags
observations() `observations<-`()
Get or set observations
measurements() `measurements<-`()
Get or set measurements
staps() `staps<-`()
Get or set staps
twilights() `twilights<-`()
Get or set twilights
paths() `paths<-`()
Get or set paths
edges() `edges<-`()
Get or set edges
pressurepaths() `pressurepaths<-`()
Get or set pressurepaths

GeoPressureTemplate

create_gldp_geopressuretemplate()
Create a GeoLocator Data Package from a GeoPressure Template
add_gldp_geopressuretemplate()
Add Geolocator DP resources from a GeoPressureTemplate
create_geopressuretemplate()
Create a GeoPressureTemplate Project

SOI

add_gldp_soi()
Add GLDP SOI Data to a Package
read_gdl() read_gdl_orders() read_gdl_data() read_gdl_access()
Read Geolocator Data and Orders

Zenodo

gldp2zenodoRecord()
Create or update a Zenodo Record based on the metadata from a GeoLocatoR Data Package
zenodoRecord2gldp()
Create or update the metadata of a GeoLocator Data Package based on a Zenodo Record

Miscellaneous functions

print(<geolocatordp>)
Print a GeoLocator Data Package
plot(<geolocatordp>)
Plot GeoLocator Data Package coverage
version()
Get GeoLocator DP version
validate_gldp()
Validate a GeoLocator Data Package
validate_gldp_py()
Validate a GeoLocator Data Package
tags2m()
Transform Tags to a Tidy Data Frame
params2t()
Generate tags from GeoPressureR parameters
params2o()
Generate observations from GeoPressureR parameters
